intro: Swartzia picta var. picta, commonly known as the painted swartzia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Fabaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking, colorful flowers that range from yellow to orange and red. Its leaves are compound, consisting of several oval-shaped leaflets. Swartzia picta var. picta is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant floral display.
